reviews.title: Repeat visitor

reviews.text: Fine all services tried were excellent including front desk

reviews.title: Great Fresno airport hotel

reviews.text: The Marriott as always was very clean and the rooms provided sufficient space. I loved the location, being very close to the airport and surrounded by a variety of eating establishments. Staff was great and the Shuttle service was a plus. Would definitely recommend to others.
reviews.title: Nice place that is conveniently located

reviews.text: Marriott Airport in Fresno, nice, clean, facility, friendly staff. We enjoyed the hot tea service in the evening. The breakfast is delicious too! Thank you for the shuttle to the Fresno Air Terminal.
reviews.title: Nice place, good value

reviews.text: I have stayed here a couple times now and it is a very comfortable stay and is close to a lot of busniess and restaurants, plus the airport. Always a friendly staff very clean has everything you need, fitness center, business center, free wifi, evening refreshments,,, I would recommend this for anyone travling for business, its perfect for all reasons.
reviews.title: Gregg S

reviews.text: It is an older building so the exterior and structural design are on par with hotels in the same timeframe. The interior, however, has kept up with the times. Good tv, good refrigerator and microwave. They still have an old window air conditioner and it runs pretty loud. The makeshift lobby bar was frequented by many guests which made it an enjoyable experience. Overall I recommend staying at this location, especially if you can take advantage of the low government rate.
reviews.title: Recommended stay

reviews.text: I 've always enjoyed the times that I've stayed at this hotel. The personnel are tremendous and very thoughtful. Any problems are handled promptly and with full attention to my needs. Thank you guys for the wonderful time.
reviews.title: Courtyard at FAT Airport

reviews.text: I use this hotel several times a year, some single nights and other times several nights. I have not been disappointed with any of the staff or the facility.
reviews.title: Courtyard at Fresno Airport

reviews.text: Have ask for recommendations for restaurants and they always have a good list to select from.
reviews.title: Courtyard at Fresno Airport

reviews.text: This hotel is well positioned for travel in and out of Fresno by air and for business in Fresno. The hotel is well designed and the staff is very efficient and friendly.
reviews.title: Good place to stay

reviews.text: As typical, Courtyard is pretty constant nationwide. I travel for work a lot and like the Marriott brands becauase they are all over and I always know what to expect. The Fresno Courtyard is no different. Staff was very friendly, room was spotless, and coffee was hot. Thanks!
reviews.title: Great Business Stay!

reviews.text: I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Courtyard near the Fresno Airport. I didn't expect the greetig that I received when I checked in. There were 3 staff members working the desk when I arrived. Each of them took the time to welcome me and offer their asssistance. During my stay each time I passed the desk or had reason to contact them they were engaging in conversation and extremely helpful. Their actions and cheerful behavior made me feel like they really were interested in their customers and in making the stay with them as pleasant as possible. It is this kind of customer service that will keep me returning to this hotel.
reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service

reviews.text: I recently had the pleasure of staying at this facility. Very friendly and professional staff. Very clean, great (and reasonably priced) breakfast buffet, and a great location. I would recommend.
reviews.title: Quick Trip

reviews.text: Always enjoy my stay here. Staff all friendly. I travel here frequently for business. The breakfast buffet is always top notch. Accommodations are comfortable.
reviews.title: FAT Courtyard

reviews.text: We had to visit family in the area on Saturday and had planned to only stay in a hotel Friday night and depart Saturday afternoon. The Marriott was so comfortable that we decided to extend our stay another night and depart on Sunday afternoon. The front desk staff was very friendly and greeted us with cookies when we checked in. I've never experienced that at a Marriott. The room was newly rennovated and the bed comfortable. The hotel was quiet and I was able to take a swim in the pool and jacuzzi each day all by myself. Being next door to Starbucks, the airport and just a short drive from a major shopping mall with a Cheesecake Factory and many other restaurants makes this hotel the perfect place to stay when in Fresno. I can't wait to go back!
reviews.title: Weekend stay was very relaxing!

reviews.text: A couple of minor inconveniences with the room. Closet door didn't open smoothly and the shampoo bottle was half empty. Weird. But apart from those two minor issues, the stay was awesome. The staff was extremely friendly, room still very comfortable, and well above average an extremely well kept hotel.
reviews.title: 2 Night Stay while attending a Seminar

reviews.text: Stayed here for a Sac State Baseball Series with Fresno State and the front desk personnel was awesome! Very polite and helpful. Quiet rooms, even with the airport across the street. Clean and good size rooms. Will stay again next year when we visit the area. Great choice if you want comfort, cleanliness, and style.
reviews.title: Great Place to Stay

reviews.text: hotel is very convient to airport, within walking distance. Staff is very friendly and accomodating. Very quiet and clean. I woukd stay here again.
reviews.title: nice hotel

reviews.text: The ONLY reason I stay here is for the Marriott reward points and there are no better hotels in this "devils armpit" they call Fresno. I have to come here to work every 6 weeks and every time I come here I DREAD it.
reviews.title: UGH!!!!

aka: Courtyard By Marriott Fresno Airport Hotel Fresno
description: At the Fresno Airport Hotel all of our guest rooms feature complimentary high speed internet service. Our hotel is 100% non-smoking with your choice of either a King room or a room with two double beds. Each room features 42 inch flat screen televisions for viewing enjoyment. We offer complimentary airport shuttle service to and from the airport 24 hours a day. We are located on McKinley and Peach next to the main enterance of Fresno Yosemite International Airport. We are pleased to have Starbucks sharing our main enterance of the Fresno Airport Hotel. We are very excited to now feature a complimentary breakfast to all of our guests. We are currently making plans to add suites to our hotel.
